snippet: San Jose forward Alan Gordon faces a suspension by Major League Soccer after he directed an anti-gay slur at Portland’s Will Johnson when the Earthquakes visited the Timbers on Sunday night.
abstract: San Jose forward Alan Gordon faces a suspension by Major League Soccer after he directed an anti-gay slur at Portland’s Will Johnson when the Earthquakes visited the Timbers on Sunday night.

headline.main: San Jose's Gordon Faces Discipline Over Antigay Slur
